name: Suburban Garden
description:
A little adventure game about the flora and fauna in my garden, made for Ludum Dare 30 with the theme "Connected Worlds".

Tips:

  • Use the arrow keys to move, F for fullscreen, ESC to quit.
  • You can play as 4 different life forms (not just a bee!)
  • The lizard can't turn in-place (by design). You have to turn while running.

Thanks for playing!
